earnPointsDescription: Earn points on every purchase and progress through tiers to unlock more benefits and receive personalized offers.
unlockPremiumExclusives: Unlock exclusive benefits with your points.
accessMemberOffers: Get access to exclusive member offers on the Rewards Club app.
earn1_5xPoints: Earn 1.5x points compared to Classic on every purchase.
earlyAccessAndEvents: Enjoy early access and special event invitations.
earnDoublePoints: Earn double the points compared to Silver on every purchase.
unlockLimitedEdition: Unlock limited edition benefits with your points.
accessPersonalisedOffers: Get access to personalized offers on the Rewards Club app.
priorityAccessAndVIP: Enjoy priority access and VIP event invitations.

explore_brands: Explore brands across fashion, beauty, home, dining, and more.
